Meriton Suites Southport Pokies Club

Is a new hotel in Australia that has received high ratings from its guests. This modern hotel offers comfortable and stylish accommodation in the Southport area, close to famous attractions.

Rooms

Rooms at Meriton Suites Southport are contemporary in design and offer all the amenities guests need for a comfortable stay. The rooms have spacious beds, comfortable furniture and modern amenities. Special attention to detail is paid to ensure guests have a pleasant and relaxing stay.

  • Studio Luxury Suite
  • 1 Bedroom Luxury Suite
  • 1 Bedroom Balcony Suite
  • 1 Bedroom Altitude Suite

About us

Meriton Suites Southport offers meeting and event facilities. The hotel has modern conference rooms and spaces for business meetings. Guests can benefit from high-quality equipment and professional staff support to host successful events.

Situated in the Southport area, Meriton Suites Southport is within close proximity to a variety of attractions. Guests have easy access to the beach, casinos, restaurants and shopping centers. Near the hotel there are also tourist sites such as the Water World Opera and the Marina Mireira Park, which are a great place for walks and relaxation.

Meriton Suites Southport is a new generation hotel offering comfortable and stylish accommodation in the Southport area. It has received high ratings from its guests due to its quality service, modern design and amenities. This hotel is an excellent choice for those who want to enjoy comfort and convenience during their trip to Australia.

Pokies room

The "Best Pokies Room" at the Meriton Suites Southport in Australia is a unique gaming space offering the very first and newest games. This place attracts visitors with its high rating and wide selection of the most popular and newest games.

The Best Pokies Room at Meriton Suites Southport offers unique gambling entertainment in a luxurious setting. Here visitors can enjoy exciting games and get large doses of excitement and possibly luck. This place is a real paradise for gamblers, where you can truly find the best and newest.
